preconditions.precondition: ALFRED Software is installed and running

mainSequence.step: Caregiver requests to enable Step Counter feature for User
ALFRED Software confirms Step Counter activation
ALFRED Device notifies User about Step Counter availability
User walks, ALFRED Device counts steps
ALFRED Software sends daily step data to Health Monitoring Service
Health Monitoring Service acknowledges receipt of daily step data
Caregiver requests Step Count Data from ALFRED Device
ALFRED Device retrieves Step Data from ALFRED Software
ALFRED Software requests User's Step Data from Health Monitoring Service
Health Monitoring Service sends User's Step Data to ALFRED Software
ALFRED Device shows Step Data to Caregiver
